#summary How to use the incubator widgets and libraries
#labels Type-Guide

= Instructions =
 # Get an incubator jar:
   * Download incubator from [http://google-web-toolkit-incubator.googlecode.com/files/incubator.jar here].
   * Follow the instructions in MakingIncubatorBetter to create your own jar.
 # Add the downloaded jar to your project's classpath.
 # Add the following lines to your module file:
{{{	
   <inherits name='com.google.gwt.widgetideas.WidgetIdeas' />	
   <inherits name='com.google.gwt.widgetideas.LibIdeas' />
}}}
 # Report bugs and enhancement requests  [http://code.google.com/p/google-web-toolkit-incubator/issues/entry here].

And you are done.
